entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
